Message.Title: In Seeking Alpha bit the guy says Alibaba valued at $63 bil in....
Message.Msg: ..Nov. 2011 by UBS analyst. That must be wrong; perhaps he meant $43 bil. Then I can not believe what a low value he comes up with for YHOO core, (now given negative value in YHOO share price). He puts value of YHOO at conservatively $21.

Topic.Title: In Seeking Alpha bit the guy says Alibaba valued at $63 bil in....

Message.Msg: $21??? Another fool who doesn't understand international taxes. The max value for Yahoo is $17.20

Topic.Title: Listen up! FB needs to be relevant and be 1 of the 3 top search engines. Expect a bid at $26

Message.Title: Hey Yahoo...With all that cash... How about a dividend ?
Message.Msg: After watching the price shrink over the last few months, isn't it about time you give some incentive to your stock holders?

Topic.Title: Listen up! FB needs to be relevant and be 1 of the 3 top search engines. Expect a bid at $26

Message.Msg: If only Yahoo had a search engine. Yahoo uses the Bing search engine owned by Microsoft. Facebook buying Microsoft?

Topic.Title: Yahoo keeps on changing things that worked.

Message.Msg: They aren't going nowhere, they are going backwards. Seems they do everything they can to alienate the people who use these boards.

Topic.Title: Yahoo keeps on changing things that worked.

Message.Msg: Kinda like a picture puzzle. You have a bunch of pieces that make no sense until you start matching them up and moving them around. Suddenly, they start to come together and then it quickly all falls together. That's when you get the big smile on your face. :)

Topic.Title: Yahoo keeps on changing things that worked.

Message.Msg: Yahoo swithced to this same format on the Apple message board about 6 to 8 weeks ago. Everybody complained and Yahoo did nothing. What's that tell you about the quality of customer service and the direction of this company?
